node.title: Australia thrashes West Indies to reach Men's T20 World Cup semis
node.alt: David Warner swings the bat on a cricket pitch with a wicketkeeper in red standing behind the stumps.
node.description: Australia qualifies for the T20 World Cup semi-finalsÂ as opening batsman David Warner scores an unbeaten 89 to secure victory with 22 balls to spare in Abu Dhabi.
node.content:
["Australia has reached\u00a0the men's T20 World Cup semi-finals with an eight-wicket win over the West Indies in Abu Dhabi.", "David Warner scored\u00a0an unbeaten 89 to secure victory with 22 balls to spare in Abu Dhabi as the Australians chased down the West Indies' target of 158.", "Australia could still have missed out if South Africa recorded a lopsided victory over England in the later match, and while the Proteas did secure victory, it was not enough to deny either Australia or England a spot in the final four.", "Warner shared in a 124-run partnership for the second wicket with Mitchell Marsh, who scored 53 before he fell to the bowling of Chris Gayle, with the scores level.", "West Indies had made 7-157\u00a0with Kieron Pollard top-scoring with 44 after Evin Lewis (29) combined with\u00a0Gayle (15) in a quickfire opening partnership of 30 in 14 balls.", "But West Indies were stopped in their tracks by an inspired spell from\u00a0Josh Hazlewood, who took\u00a04-39.", "Leg spinner Adam Zampa also bowled well, with 1-20 from 4 overs, while Mitchell Starc and Pat Cummins also picked up a wicket each.", "Andre Russell gave the West Indies' innings a late flourish by smashing two sixes in his seven-ball 18 not out.", "", "
Adam Zampa took 1-20 to help restrict West Indies to 157 off their 20 overs.(Reuters:\u00a0Hamad I Mohammed)
", "The already-eliminated Caribbean side dismissed Australian captain Aaron Finch for only 9 in the fourth over.", "But Warner and Marsh took control of the game, with the left-hander returning to his best form, hitting nine sixes and four boundaries.", "Marsh, who scored his 53 in just 32 balls, was dismissed when only one run was needed.", "The new batsman Glenn Maxwell didn't face a ball as Warner brought up victory with a leg glance past Gayle to the boundary.", "\"It felt satisfying to be there at the end ... the key was to play my natural game,\" Warner said.", "\"It's about targeting the first two balls [of the over] and I was able to do that.", "\"[Our bowlers] have been outstanding [because]\u00a0we\u00a0know the firepower West Indies have and they got to a very competitive total.\"", "Australia finished Group 1 in second place, level on eight points with first-placed England and unlucky third South Africa. The Proteas missed out on a semi-final placing by virtue of a poorer run-rate.", "
Proteas denied despite beating vaunted England
", "After Australia's win over the West Indies, South Africa needed a victory over high-flying England and a massive run-rate boost to make the last four.", "The Proteas\u00a0showed some intent with the bat and Rassie van der Dussen blasted an unbeaten 94 off 60 balls to propel South Africa to 2 for 189, their highest score of the tournament.", "Their total meant South Africa had to restrict England to 131 or fewer to make the semi-finals ahead of Australia, while scoring 87 was enough for Eoin Morgan's team.", "Moeen Ali (37) and Dawid Malan (33) chipped in with breezy cameos to snuff out South Africa's semi-final hopes but Kagiso Rabada's final over hat-trick restricted England to 8 for 179,\u00a0snapping their winning streak in the tournament.", "ABC/Reuters", "
Scorecard
"]
